21.text: He is out of His mind

18.text: who had been possessed by the demons

31.text: they did not even have time

33.text: you do not have in mind

18.text: it throws him to the ground

16.text: He took [the children] in His arms

42.text: a small fraction of a denarius

26.text: when they had sung a hymn

29.text: You who are going to destroy

36.text: and held it up for [Jesus] to drink
